doc:
Joe Besser https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joe_Besser 0 Joe Besser (August 12, 1907 – March 1, 1988) was an American actor, comedian and musician, known for his impish humor and wimpy characters. He is best known for his brief stint as a member of the Three Stooges in movie short subjects of 1957–59. He is also remembered for his television roles: Stinky, the bratty man-child in The Abbott and Costello Show, and Jillson, the maintenance man in The Joey Bishop Show. Joe_Besser ( August_12_,_1907 – March_1_,_1988 ) was an_American_actor , comedian_and_musician , known for his_impish_humor and wimpy_characters . He is_best_known for his_brief_stint as a_member of the_Three_Stooges in movie_short_subjects of 1957 – 59 . He is_also_remembered for his_television_roles : Stinky , the_bratty_man-child in The_Abbott and Costello_Show , and Jillson , the_maintenance_man in The_Joey_Bishop_Show .
